Class TableViewColumnListener.Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pivot.wtk.TableViewColumnListener.Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TableViewColumnListener
    Enclosing interface:
    TableViewColumnListener
    @Deprecated
public static class TableViewColumnListener.Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements TableViewColumnListener
    Deprecated.
    Since 2.1 and Java 8 the interface itself has default implementations.
    Table view column listener adapter.
